data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.

data.meanings: to be thin and soft, parchment, sheet of paper, broad and soft fine thing, volume or scroll.
data.sentence: The word رَقٍّ comes from the root ر ق ق and is associated with the meanings: to be thin and soft, parchment, sheet of paper, broad and soft fine thing, volume or scroll.

data.meanings: to spread out, bring back to life, resuscitate, be extended, lay open, unfold, expand, display, spread abroad.
data.sentence: The word مَنْشُورٍ comes from the root ن ش ر and is associated with the meanings: to spread out, bring back to life, resuscitate, be extended, lay open, unfold, expand, display, spread abroad.
